comments.body:
The whole service concept does not belong into the genericapiserver.

We have a number of concepts in there because they are shared among master and the federation server and therefore hard to factor out. We need an intermediate kubeserver package.
Having said that, that's follow-up work of course. Can you add a TODO here?

> We have a number of concepts in there because they are shared among master and the federation server and therefore hard to factor out. We need an intermediate kubeserver package.

I agree, but I'd like this first.

> Having said that, that's follow-up work of course. Can you add a TODO here?

Sure.
